Regenerative Assets

Building decentralized tools for regenerative land management, regenerative economics, and positive social impact.

View Our Projects Get In Touch

About Regenerative Assets

Regenerative Assets is a software company building tools to support companies and projects that are working on innovative projects in regenerative land management, regenerative economics, and positive social impact.

Since our team have a lot of experience building Holochain applications, most of our software is designed to operate in a decentralized manner creating cryptographically signed records with an immutable and auditable history of actions.

Current Projects

Real Assets Registry

A decentralized system for registering and managing real estate assets with cryptographically signed records and immutable audit trails.

Real Clear

Custom adapted version of the Domino multi-unit accounting software designed to power a Real-World-Assets Clearinghouse.

Offline Remittance Transfers

Innovative solutions for secure, offline remittance transfers using decentralized technology for financial inclusion.

Privacy Policy

We respect your privacy. This website does not collect, store, or sell any personal information. We do not use tracking cookies, analytics, or any form of user surveillance. Your visit to this site is completely private and anonymous. We believe in building technology that respects human dignity and privacy.
